name: DojoSlash Alpha
description:
Choose your dojo and prove that your the best samuraï!

This is a versus game inspired by Towerfall. Easy to learn, hard to master ;) .

Shoot shuriken, kunaï, fire bomb, Reflect, Dash, Feint, Spike!

__________________________________________________________________

You can't play it solo, it's a 2 player game. (the  coop mode don't exist)

Only keyboard, keyboard+controller, 2 controllers : AS YOU WISH ;)

You can change rules to had fun in your party (Gravity, slip, jump strength)

Don't forget to read the manual :D !

__________________________________________________________________

This game represent many things for me because it was my first complete game, this is also my first creation at LISAA, my first pixel art game, my first try with controller set-up...

All was made by me in one month (first month of school)
